data.name: Base Jump
data.detailed_description:
The game revolves around players building their bases and destroying the other players bases while fighting each other, sometimes under the effect of crazy power-ups. Players can fight against a friend or foe on the same device, or against a computer AI.

The main objective of the players should focus on maintaining more bases than their opponent. There is a meter that goes towards one player or the other depending on the ownership of the bases.

The more bases a player has the faster the meter will move towards that player.
data.about_the_game:
The game revolves around players building their bases and destroying the other players bases while fighting each other, sometimes under the effect of crazy power-ups. Players can fight against a friend or foe on the same device, or against a computer AI.

The main objective of the players should focus on maintaining more bases than their opponent. There is a meter that goes towards one player or the other depending on the ownership of the bases.

The more bases a player has the faster the meter will move towards that player.
data.short_description: Base Jump is a fast-paced competitive action platformer available for one or two players locally.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: win 10
  • Processor: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: win 10
  • Processor: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Mojave
  • Processor: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated graphic card with 1.5 GB VRAM
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Catalina
  • Processor: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Dedicated graphic card with 1 GB RAM
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: IMPORTANT: In MacOS Catalina Apple introduced new security measures and you'll get the message "Base Jump would like to receive keystrokes from any application" simply deny the request and the game will still work, we don't collect anything in any way, the message pop up due to how Unity listens for keystrokes to make the game work.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Ubuntu 18.04 LTS or newer
  • Processor: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 3.2+ or Vulkan-capable, Nvidia and AMD GPUs.
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Ubuntu 18.04 LTS or newer
  • Processor: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 3.2+ or Vulkan-capable, Nvidia and AMD GPUs.
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
